alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:12PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sheridan County through 1215 AM MDT... At 1111 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Westby, or 15 miles northeast of Plentywood, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Westby and Comertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
